name: The Hero
overview: In the distant future, the earth will be attacked by alien spaceships whose aim is to steal natural resources. As the most experienced pilot, you have been chosen to destroy the alien headquarters. To do this, you have to fight your way through all the levels of defense. There are 3 spaceships available for each task, whereby there are extra ships for every level achieved. Should you survive all nine levels, you will return to earth as a hero. Released in the following: • Magic Disk 64 1988/03 • Digital Marketing PD #072.
